content: Called out by the White House press corps for his jaw-dropping series of embarrassing bloopers, Spicer said, “I screwed up, plain and simple — especially with it being Passover week, with our Secretary of State visiting Moscow, with a U.S. nuclear sub sitting provocatively off the coast of the Korean Peninsula, and President Trump determined to put Iran back in its place. As press secretary, I just have to learn to keep my mouth shut whenever the mainstream media asks me a question.”
